title: Communication Method Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of methods organizations use for internal and external communications in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each communication method (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

digital_network.description: Electronic systems for transmitting information through computers, mobile devices, or other digital platforms.

encrypted_messaging.description: Secure communications protected through cryptographic methods to prevent unauthorized access.

physical_documents.description: Tangible papers, files, or written materials exchanged through direct handling.

verbal_directives.description: Spoken instructions or information delivered in person or through audio channels.

public_announcements.description: Open declarations made to large audiences without attempt at secrecy.

coded_language.description: Communication using phrases, terms, or references with hidden meanings known only to insiders.

telepathic_link.description: Direct mind-to-mind connection allowing thoughts to be transmitted without physical means.

courier_service.description: Trusted messengers who physically transport information between locations.

ritual_communion.description: Ceremonial practices that establish spiritual or mystical connections between participants.

holographic_projection.description: Three-dimensional light-based displays that can transmit visual information remotely.

neural_interface.description: Direct connection between human nervous systems and technological networks for information exchange.

dead_drops.description: Secret locations where information can be deposited and retrieved without direct contact.

satellite_transmission.description: Signals sent via orbiting relay stations to connect distant locations.

subspace_relay.description: Fictional technology that sends information through alternate dimensions for faster-than-light communication.

magical_sending.description: Supernatural methods that transmit messages through arcane forces or enchantments.

proxies_and_cutouts.description: Intermediaries who relay messages while obscuring the connection between source and recipient.

augmented_reality.description: Digital overlays on physical environments that can contain messages or information.

virtual_reality_space.description: Simulated environments where members can gather and interact despite physical separation.

physical_gathering.description: In-person meetings, assemblies, or events where information is shared directly.

public_media_channel.description: Broadcasts, publications, or online platforms accessible to general audiences.

quantum_entanglement.description: Advanced technology using paired particles for instantaneous communication regardless of distance.

dreams_and_visions.description: Supernatural transmission of information through dreamstates or prophetic experiences.

securityLevels.description: Classification of communication methods by typical security (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

high.description: Methods that provide strong protection against interception or unauthorized access.

moderate.description: Methods with reasonable security that requires specific skills or resources to compromise.

low.description: Methods that may be vulnerable to various forms of interception or monitoring.

public.description: Methods designed to reach wide audiences rather than maintain confidentiality.
